cyclone.name: OMAR
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles SSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast to east-northeast and expected to remain well offshore of the U.S. East Coast while heading into the open Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: No U.S. landfall expected (closest pass will be offshore of the Outer Banks, NC)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Surf and rip-current conditions mainly along the Outer Banks of North Carolina; no direct impact expected along the Georgia coast
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: CAPE HATTERAS NC (closest point listed in probability table)
weather_observation.wind: Breezy onshore flow possible, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds not expected
